description: Everyone's favorite camping/cabin/après/dog walking shoe is back. The original hybrid slip-on has been updated once again, and it's now even comfier (if that's possible). With a quick-cinch bungee for a more secure fit and cozy fleece lining. Super comfy inside, with traction for outside. Take comfort ... everywhere.
name: Keen Howser III Slide - Mens

specs.value: A quick-cinch bungee closure creates a more secure fit around the foot
Durable, higher-traction rubber outsole made for outside
Our iconic KEEN fit with generous space across your forefoot for toes to spread out
